text:
Привет,

Приложено изпращам фактурата за наема на офиса в Гърция. Сумата е е общият депозит за двата офиса, равен на стойността на 2-месечни наема.

 

Начинът на плащане е посочен на страница 3 от фактурата.

 

Отбелязва се, че плащането трябва да бъде направено възможно най-скоро и не по-късно от 01/03, за да бъде активиран договорът и да имаме право да се нанесем.

 

Тъй, като в момента не мога да сканирам и подпиша фактурата, моля да се заяви за плащане, а утре ще я подпиша и ще я изпратя.

 

Поздрави!

 

From: Trade <Trade@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2023 10:29 AM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Subject: FW: Invoice for the tenancy of all-inclusive offices at Kifissias Junction
Importance: High

 

За заявка

 

From: Athanasios Konstantopoulos <Akon@tibiel.com <mailto:Akon@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Monday, February 27, 2023 9:06 AM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Trade <Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> >; Kristina Lazarova <k.lazarova@tibiel.com <mailto:k.lazarova@tibiel.com> >
Subject: Invoice for the tenancy of all-inclusive offices at Kifissias Junction
Importance: High

 

Dear Nikolay,

 

Good morning! Please find attached invoice for the tenancy of all-inclusive offices at Kifissias Junction. 

 

The Invoice 5025_2023_8STM has a total amount of 2276 EUR, which is the Total Deposit for both offices, equal to the value of 2 month's rent and it was raised and due on 26/02/2023. 

 

Method of Payment is given on page 3 of the invoice. 

 

It is noted that payment must be made as soon as possible and no later than 01/03 in order the contract to be activated and have the right to move in.

 

PS: It is a BANK HOLIDAY in Greece today, however the Banking System operates.

 

Kind Regards,

Thanasis

 

 

 

Thanasis Konstantopoulos PhD, MSc, BSc, MAC, AIEMA 

Business Development General Manager

and Representative of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece

M:+359 893 930 389

E-mail: akon@tibiel.com <mailto:akon@tibiel.com>
subject: FW: ЗА ЗАЯВКА ЗА ПЛАЩАНЕ
